briefTitle: Light Emitting Diode (LED) for the Treatment of Wrinkles
officialTitle: Non-ablative Light Source for the Treatment of Rhytides (Wrinkles)
summary: The purpose of this study was to determine whether light emitting diode (LED) therapy can improve skin appearance of human subjects with aged/photoaged skin. A reduction in rhytid depth as well as in skin surface roughness and in the degree of elastosis after LED treatments was expected.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Microtopographic Profilometry Ra Values (Skin Roughness).
